short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you with keeping multiple text values to copy to clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you will be allow to paste multiple texts across the tabs to easily copypaste them. Imagine that your clipboard contains not the only one text, but multiple ones for easier selecting which text should be pasted on each tab
